Use this data source to retrieve information about a GitHub user.

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as github from "@pulumi/github";

const example = pulumi.output(github.getUser({
    username: "example",
}, { async: true }));
```
